cab.content: Military Secret.JBi/kiii Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, &JJ bth October 1919.A 1.1 ^(Repeated to Constantinople and Vladivostock under No. 76028.)(Received 6th.) 13554. 5th October. Malleson wires 3rd October : " Agent, who has been Merv and Yulatan, returning from Merv 23rd September via Sarakhs, has arrived here. Only very occasional trains from Merv beyond Yuiatan. Merv starving and conscription of all ages rigorously, enforced ; all conscriptions immediately sent east, ' where great disturbances (? reported.' It was said in Merv important Turkish envoy expected go through to Tashkent expressly to attend conference of Bolshevic, German, Afghan and other representatives. Afghan mission from Kushk expect visit Bokhara to compose differences between Amir and Bolshevics."
